mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments VALUES ( comment_seq.nextval, #{articleId}, #{memberSeqId}, #{content}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.id, c.content, c.write_date FROM members m, articles a, comments c WHERE m.seq_id = a.writer_seq_id AND a.id = c.article_id AND c.article_id = #{articleId};
